alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:07AM EDT until April 01 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT FOR PORTAGE...GEAUGA...EASTERN LAKE...STARK...SUMMIT...EASTERN WAYNE AND EASTERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 307 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Madison to near Hudson to near Orrville, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Painesville, Ravenna, Chardon, Millersburg, Cuyahoga Falls, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Alliance, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, North Canton, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Louisville and Orrville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
